Function Documentation

static bool fieldIsMDNode ( const MDNode *  DbgNode,
unsigned  Elt 
)
static

Check if a field at position Elt of a MDNode is a MDNode.

We currently allow an empty string and an integer. But we don't allow a non-empty string in a MDNode field.
